title: Finish the Masterwork weapon
content:
nal speaks of a blueprint that will help you create a masterwork weapon. To find this blueprint, head into the next room of the house and burn away the web covering the hole in the floor. Jump in and your party will roll automatic Perception Checks. If anyone succeeds, you'll find a locked Wooden Chest just to your northeast. Lockpicking it requires you to pass a DC 10 Sleight of Hand Check, and if you succeed, you'll find Highcliff's Blueprints, progressing the quest further.
